title: Where can I find free MIDI drum samples? - Quora

response.answer_text: Take a look at products for songwriters, musicians and producers. You will need the EZ Drummer to use the midi files in your DAW. You can also use the drum samples that comes with it, or you can use your own. Disclaimer: I am not affiliated with toontrack and I don't get any commissions or reward. I jist use their products and I find their products pretty good for what you need.

Free Drum Kits, Free Sound Kits, Free Sound Samples has a lot of nice ones. Free Drum Kits, Free Sound Kits, Free Sound Samples I just reread the question, and I'm not sure if you're looking for samples, or pre-made patterns or both, but I hope my answer helps.
